current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Recognizing the patriotism and contributions of auxiliaries of veterans service
			 organizations.

cosponsor.#tail: ) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the

action-desc.#text: Committee discharged; considered and agreed to

text.#text:
encourages the people of the United States to promote awareness of the contributions and dedication
			 of members of auxiliaries to members of the Armed
			 Forces, veterans, and their families; and

calls on the people of the United States to follow the noble example of the auxiliaries of veterans
			 service organizations and volunteer support and services
			 to those who have selflessly served the United States.
Whereas auxiliaries have representatives in all 50 States and abroad;

Whereas auxiliary units have raised money to aid and enhance the lives of members of the
			 Armed Forces, veterans, and their families through financial
			 support—providing assistance with essentials such as rent, child care,
			 utilities, and food;

quote.#tail: that focus on providing vital health and support services to homeless veterans;

text.#text:
Whereas auxiliary units strengthen their local communities by conducting food drives, visiting
			 hospitals, and providing scholarships to youth;
Whereas auxiliary units serve as advocates for veterans and their families;

Whereas auxiliary units conduct welcome home and send-off events for members of the
			 Armed Forces;

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
throughout the country to enhance
			 the lives of veterans and their families; and

text.#text:
Whereas members of auxiliaries selflessly volunteer their services at facilities
			  of the

Whereas, each year, auxiliary units raise millions of dollars for cancer research: Now, therefore,
			 be it

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SRES 506 ATS: Recognizing the patriotism and contributions of auxiliaries of veterans service organizations.
